info.title: Resource Assignment Source for Project Demands â€“ Read
info.description: This service enables you to read resource assignment sources for project demands along with their descriptions. You can use this service, for example, to retrieve supported values for the corresponding field in the **Resource Assignment** entity of the **Project Demand** API, or to make the descriptions of the resource assignment sources available for your custom application.

x-sap-shortText: Read resource assignment sources for project demands using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Resource Assignment Source for Project Demands Integration(SAP_COM_0928)
[Project Control - Resourcing and Procurement(4RF)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/4RF " Link To BP ")
[Project Control - Resourcing and Procurement(PRF)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/PRF " Link To BP ")
